title: ellAm nIyE ammA
sahitya:
ellAm nIyE ammA parAshakti engum nIyE ammA


anupallavi

  shollAl un mahimaiyai shollavum kUDumO


caraNam    karaiyillAk-karuNai nIyE kAr meghamum kATrum kadirum nIyE
varaiyillAk-kaDalum nIyE uyar malaivaLar nadiyum nIyE
taraiyellAm payirum nIyE uyirgaLait-tAngum iyarkkai nIyE
parivAna mAtA nI paramAtma jyOti nI arivAna AtmA nI haranArin pAdi nI
